name: Amazon Economist Interview Guide
description: Insider guide to Amazon's economist tracks: Forecasting, Causal Analysis, and Empirical IO. Leadership Principles meet econometrics.

name: Uber Data Scientist Interview
description: Focus on two-sided markets and interference. 'If we lower rider prices, what happens to driver supply?'

name: Meta Data Scientist Interview
description: Focus on experimentation, causal inference, and product analytics at massive scale. A/B testing, network effects, and marketplace experiments.

name: Evan's Pages: Industry Interview Advice
description: Former Amazon economist with 250+ interviews. Frameworks for behavioral and technical interviews. 'Job interviewing is its own skillâ€”99% of people need to practice it.'

name: Ace the Data Science Interview
description: 201 real questions from FAANG, startups, and Wall Street. By two ex-Facebook employees. The industry-standard prep resource.

name: Scarlet Chen: Econ PhD to Tech
description: Stanford PhD turned Google/Shopify DS. Detailed series on job hunting, interviews, and salary negotiation. How she negotiated to $300k+ first year.

name: Rose Tan: Tech Jobs for Econ PhDs
description: Two-part LinkedIn guide on navigating tech's decentralized job market. Networking tips, role types, and what econ PhDs should expect.

name: Levels.fyi
description: Crowdsourced tech compensation data. Compare salaries across companies, levels, and locations. The industry standard for knowing your market value.

name: Layoffs.fyi
description: Real-time tracker of tech layoffs. See which companies are cutting, hiring freezes, and market trends. Essential for timing your job search.

name: Levels.fyi Negotiation Guide
description: The industry standard for tech compensation data. Detailed guide on base, equity, bonus structures and how to negotiate each.

name: Candor: Salary Negotiation
description: Strategies tech insiders use to negotiate. Competing offers, leveling, and how to avoid leaving money on the table.

name: Exponent: Tech Salary Negotiation
description: Comprehensive guide to negotiating base, equity, and bonus. 'The biggest mistake is doing nothing. The other side expects you to negotiate.'

name: Teamrora: DS Salary Negotiation
description: Data scientist-specific negotiation tactics. Understanding equity (RSUs vs options), sign-on bonuses, and level-based compensation bands.
